Sheet-of-Ice.name: Sheet of Ice
Sheet-of-Ice.materialComponent: a twig once frozen completely in ice
description: You create a 3-inch-thick sheet of ice on a @;solid surface;@ within range, or spanning @;two solid anchor;@ points within range. You may choose to make the ice sheet up to @;20 feet long;@ and @;20 feet wide;@.
When the sheet of ice appears, each creature within its area must make a @;Dexterity;@ saving throw. On a failed save, is knocked @;prone;@.

The first time a creature attempts to move across an effected area of the ice sheet during a turn or ends its turn there, the creature must make a @;Dexterity;@ saving throw. On a failed save, it is knocked @;prone;@.

If the sheet of ice is suspended between two anchor points, it can hold up to @;150 lbs;@ of weight before shattering. The sheet of ice has an AC of 12 and 10 hit points, and is @;vulnerable;@ to fire damage.
